title: NC teen girl dies in shooting; 2nd teen charged, deputies say
content:
KINSTON, N.C. (WNCT) – A teenage girl was killed on Thursday in Kinston after a gun accidentally discharged.
Blake Kyndall Turner, 17, died in the incident, which happened around 6:20 p.m. Thursday, the Kinston Free-Press reported.
Austin Ray Newcome, 18, was arrested and charged with involuntary manslaughter and possession of a stolen firearm.
Lenoir County officials responded to the shooting at 3901 Mimosa Lane in LaGrange. When they arrived, deputies found a Turner, who had been shot with serious injuries.
After thorough investigation, the evidence showed that Newcome was handling the gun when it accidentally discharged, causing Turner to be struck.
Since the shooting, friends and family have started a GoFundMe page to help the family pay for a funeral for Blake.
The investigation is ongoing.
Newcome is being held at the W.E. Smith Detention Center.
